snippet: Darrell Issa, the California Republican who is giving up the chairmanship of the House Oversight Committee is seeking testimony from Jonathan Gruber, the economist who advised the Obama administration on the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Darrell Issa, the California Republican who is giving up the chairmanship of the House Oversight Committee is seeking testimony from Jonathan Gruber, the economist who advised the Obama administration on the Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: And now, a parting shot from Representative Darrell Issa.

headline.main: Issa Issues Subpoena to Obama Health Consultant

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
